title: Karma
lyrics:
Drowning in the water, sinking to the bottom
Found a way to let you in
Breaking all of my rules, like we're back in high school
Let you get under my skin
Really had me thinkin' that you cared
Every word you said was empty air

I'm drowning in the water, it's you that held me under



So you can't argue

Karma's coming for you

Before you come knocking at my door

Old tricks, no you can not fix

Things that you did



Wondering where did you go

When I was wholehearted?

Palm of your hand

But you didn't want it

Let down my walls when I was so guarded

Blinded by you

You hit my phone like, "Hey, how you doin'?"

You really think that I was that stupid?

Karma's a bitch, and baby she's ruthless

Coming for you

She's coming for you

She's coming for you



Left me in the worst way

Using every birthday to call me up

Like we're still friends

But every conversation has got me suffocating

You only want what you can't have

Not one thing about you that I miss

Wish that I could take back every kiss

And every one of our friends

Knows about what you did



So you can't argue

Karma's coming for you

Before you come knocking at my door

Old tricks, no you can not fix

Things that you did



Wondering where did you go

When I was wholehearted?

Palm of your hand

But you didn't want It

Let down my walls when I was so guarded

Blinded by you

You hit my phone like, "Hey, how you doin'?"

You really think that I was that stupid?

Karma's a bitch, and baby she's ruthless

Coming for you

She's coming for you

She's coming for you



Wondering where did you go?

I was whole, I was whole

Where did you go?

I was whole, I was whole, I was whole



Wondering where did you go

When I was wholehearted?

Palm of your hand

But you didn't want it

Let down my walls when I was so guarded

Blinded by you

You hit my phone like, "Hey, how you doin'?

You really think that I was that stupid?

Karma's a bitch, and baby she's ruthless

Coming for you

She's coming for you

She's coming for you

She's coming for you

She's coming for you
